CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 6, 1941, pg. 10, reads: "Glamorous Scenes as Society Turns Out To See "Aida" - Highlight of the National Association of Musicians' convention in Pittsburgh was the performance of the great opera, "Aida" by an entire Negro cast...James Moore and ...Gaines... - Photos by Harris and Lewis"
TitMainTitle: James Moore and Ms. Gaines wearing fur jacket, standing in Syria Mosque for National Negro Opera Company performance of "Aida"
